sentences.english: Wet acrylic mixed with oils is a disaster.
sentences.chinese: 湿法腈纶与油混合是一场灾难。

sentences.english: The production expansion of evaporating equipment was introduced for solvent NaSCN in PAN fiber production.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了腈纶生产中溶剂硫氰酸钠蒸发装置的扩产改造。

sentences.english: All in all, acrylon is an acid-base, the best a dyed.
sentences.chinese: 总之，腈纶是一栽耐酸碱的纤维，最坏一次染成。

sentences.english: Acrylon the elasticity of the fabric and bulkiness have direct impact on a production style.
sentences.chinese: 腈纶织物的不塑性和膨松性会间接感化制品品格。

sentences.english: Or it can be made from manufactured materials such as nylon, acrylic and polyester.
sentences.chinese: 或者也可以从制造材料，如锦纶，腈纶和涤纶。

sentences.english: It also puts forward suggestions to promote the competitiveness of domestic acrylic fiber enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 提出提高国内腈纶生产企业竞争能力的若干建议。

sentences.english: The cross - section of dry- spinning acrylic fiber is dog bone .
sentences.chinese: 干法腈纶纤维具有犬骨形异型截面。

sentences.english: Acrylic fibers with light-sensitive color can also be dyed in such a way.
sentences.chinese: 通过纺丝线中染色也可制造光致变色腈纶。

sentences.english: Hydrolization technology on acrylic fibers is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 对腈纶纤维的水解工艺进行研究。

sentences.english: Acrylic tow is produced from acrylic top by drawing process.
sentences.chinese: 腈纶丝束采用拉断工艺方法制条。
